about_the_game:
In the world of underground heads-up poker, your opponents are ruthless, cunning, and not afraid to play dirty. But you’ve got an edge: They have no idea that you're willing to cheat to win.

Every puzzle in Fool House is meticulously crafted by hand, offering a unique challenge that requires clever thinking and precise execution. To win, you must use a variety of cheats to manipulate the game in your favor: Change the value or suit of a card, pull an ace from your sleeve, clone a card, or swap them with your opponents!

Key Features

  • Handcrafted Puzzles: Each poker match is a unique, carefully designed puzzle that challenges you to outwit your opponent.
  • Variety of Cheating Techniques: Change card values or suits, clone cards or hands, slip an ace up your sleeve, or swap cards with your opponent.
  • Experiment and Master: With the option to restart any puzzle, you can try different approaches and master the art of deception.

short_description: *Fool House* is a single-player poker puzzle game where you must cheat to win. Outsmart shady opponents by manipulating the game: change card values, pull aces from your sleeve, or swap hands with your rivals. Do you have what it takes to outcheat them all and walk away with the winnings?
